short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assists you to keep your focus on your tasks by distracting websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever get distracted from your task by watching YouTube videos or website that you don't necessary have to visit?
Browse Ya Later is an extension for helping user to keep focus on their task.
When you found a website that you really want to visit, just keep it on a queue!
Later on, when you are in break, you can open the website from the queue and enjoy your break!
Demo Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ujTrOaOeco
